title: Guideville Band of Pomo Indians
content:
The Guideville Band of Pomo Indians is a Native American tribe of the Pomo Indians of northern California.[1]

The tribe's origin is of the original settlers of areas in Mendocino, Lake, and Sonoma counties. 

The tribe currently has 122 members.[1]

Other bands of Pomo include the Lytton Band of Pomo Indians and the Scotts Valley Band of Pomo Indians.

In the 2000s, the tribe unsuccessfully attempted to build a Las Vegas-style casino at Point Molate in Contra Costa County.[1]
